page.title: 05CASTLE AS TOURIST ATTRACTION
page.content:
We asked the tourists what had attracted them to the castle. We got a variety of answers. Some of these answers were: 1) Like visiting old English castles. 2) Interested in local historic buildings. 3) It is a fascinating place to visit. 4) Interested in Roman buildings. 5) Interested in Norman buildings. 6) Afternoon out.
Lastly, we asked them whether it is important to maintain historic buildings. All said yes, stating that historic buildings are our heritage and that they enable us to get a good idea of what happened in our past.
